channel.title: Software Developer Portfolio on Main
channel.description: Recent content in Software Developer Portfolio on Main

item.title: Project-1: Calculator
item.description: This is a Calculator. It have ability to zoom his numbers and values with animation. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project-2: Mathematic Matrix
item.description: This is a Mathematic Matrix and is like a small game. There are 4 Types of Operator as (+,-,*,/). We can choose each Operator from Combo box line. Every operator calculated numbers to 10th of values as depend from operator going to 100 or law values. For more fun,every time when we choose an operator, randomly boxes from matrix randomly would be empty and we should to find where are the empty boxes and to type the write values in the box.

item.title: Project-3: Scale Check
item.description: This is a Scale Check Software, which can be connected with Data Bank or connected with live sources as(Devices or etc.) and give us data which we needed for work. Link to GitHub to Repository

item.title: Project-4: Software for Logistic and Storage
item.description: This is a Software for Warehouse and Logistic. Those Software has two Pages of Functions and they are connected with Data Base, first is about Storage, reserve, delete data from Warehouse. Also, give us exactly where are the free and occupied places to store packets or what of purpose we need. Second pages, show us where are the free and occupied places in two separated boxes which are green(free) and red(occupied).
